Detailed Description: The checkout form fails to process user input correctly, preventing users from completing their purchases.
Step to Reproduce:
- Steps to Reproduce:
- Log in with provided credentials.
- Add any item to the cart.
- Proceed to checkout.
- Enter required information and attempt to complete the purchase.
Actual Results: Checkout form remains unresponsive or shows errors, preventing transactions.
Expected Results: Users should be able to enter their details and complete their purchase without issue.

Detailed Description: Clicking on the "About" page link results in a 404 error, meaning users cannot access company information.
Step to Reproduce:
- Navigate to the homepage.
- Click on the "About" page link.
Actual Results: Page does not exist and returns a 404 error.
Expected Results: The page should display relevant company details or redirect properly.

Comments/Notes: This defect impacts credibility and accessibility, affecting user trust in the site.

Detailed Description: All product images are identical and do not match the listed products, causing confusion.
Step to Reproduce:
- Navigate to the products page.
- Observe product listings and corresponding images.
Actual Results: Every item displays the same incorrect image.
Expected Results: Each product should have a unique and representative image.

Comments/Notes: This issue affects usability and visual clarity, making it difficult for users to shop accurately.
